snippet: The attack on a Roman Catholic priest was the latest aimed at Christian clergy members and churches in the last year on the Tanzanian island, which has a Muslim majority.
abstract: Roman Catholic priest  Rev Joseph Mwang’amba is burned in acid attack in Zanzibar, latest sign of rising religious tensions in country.
lead_paragraph: The attack on a Roman Catholic priest was the latest aimed at Christian clergy members and churches in the last year on the Tanzanian island, which has a Muslim majority.

headline.main: Priest in Zanzibar Is Burned in Another Attack on Clergy
headline.print_headline: Priest in Zanzibar Is Burned In Another Attack on Clergy
